emuInput.TitMainTitle: Rev. A. E. Harris, Ora Sims, Rev. Leroy Patrick, Jessie Vann, and William Howell, seated behind folding table in Bethesda United Presbyterian Church during seventh annual beautiful yard awards program
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 15, 1962, pg. 17 reads: "Beautiful Yard Awards Program - Cultivators of above-average yards in Homewood attended the seventh annual awards program and tea sponsored by the Homewood Community Improvement Association...Program participants pictured lower left are the Rev. A.E. Harris, Mrs. Ora Sims, the Rev. Leroy Patrick, Mrs. Vann and William Howell, president of the HCIA...-Harris Photos."
